name: z Search
description: Fast z-like directory search. z is a command line tool to quickly jump to directories that you have visited recently or frequently. This extension allows you to do just that in Ulauncher. More information on GitHub.

preferences.name: Maximal number of results to show
Path to z file
preferences.description: Location of your z file. Typically ~/.z

preferences.name: Update the z file when opening a directory
preferences.description: If you don't want this extension to touch your z file, set to 'no'.
